name: Abysm of Avarice
description:
Submission for Godot Wild Jam 45. Theme: Underground

Used Wildcards:

  • Breathtaking: Include a scenic view
  • Deal with the devil: Make a trade that you'll regret

Content: You find yourself in a cursed environment inhabited by strange creatures. Abysm of Avarice is a dungeon crawler inspired by The Binding of Isaac and Sundered.

Control: WASD for Movement, Left Mouse for Shooting
